DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective , multi-centre , observational study assess daily practice pattern outcomes management rheumatoid arthritis patient treat RoActemra/Actemra ( tocilizumab ) . No actual patient enrol study ; data collect medical record .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective , Observational Study RoActemra/Actemra ( Tocilizumab ) Clinical Practice Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > =18 year age Diagnosed rheumatoid arthritis moderate severe disease activity define DAS28 > =5.1 Inadequate responder least 2 nonbiological DMARDs Absence document erosion start RoActemra/Actemra treatment Received RoActemra/Actemra treatment least 6 month Availability data least RoActemra/Actemra treatment initiation visit 6 month visit Contraindications treatment RoActemra/Actemra
